channel.title: Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.description: I’m a bioinformatics master’s student at TUM and LMU and joined the Chair of Experimental Bioinformatics for my bachelor’s thesis. Here, I developed a risk score for mortality prediction in patients undergoing transcatheter aortic valve implantation. Currently, I am working as a HiWi at the chair.

item.title: A Systematic Comparison of Novel and Existing Differential Analysis Methods for CyTOF Data
CYANUS
item.description: R shiny app for the analysis of cytometry data with a focus on differential analysis.
